metadata.feature_description: Visual indicators showing engagement trends with up/down arrows and warnings

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard loads with trend indicators visible
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel failed to load - blank white panel displayed. JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init

issues: Community Analytics module fails to initialize due to JavaScript error: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function. The entire dashboard does not render, preventing any testing of trend arrows.

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard loads with warning indicators visible for concerning trends
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel failed to load - blank white panel displayed due to JavaScript initialization error

issues: Unable to test warning indicators - Community Analytics module fails to initialize due to JavaScript error: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard loads with colored trend indicators
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel failed to load - blank white panel displayed due to JavaScript initialization error

issues: Unable to test indicator colors - Community Analytics module fails to initialize due to JavaScript error: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard loads with tooltips available on trend indicators
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel failed to load - blank white panel displayed due to JavaScript initialization error

issues: Unable to test tooltips - Community Analytics module fails to initialize due to JavaScript error: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

observations: Code review of social-dashboard-instance.js (lines 68-73, 374-376, 396-401, 482-508) shows engagement trend indicator implementation exists with percentProgress values (1=higher, 0=equal, -1=lower), CSS classes for arrows, healthStatus for warnings, and createComparativeTooltip() for tooltip generation

The Community Analytics module fails to load due to a critical JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init (social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025:39)
This error occurs during module initialization and prevents the entire Community Analytics dashboard from rendering
The engagement trend indicator SVG files mentioned in the feature documentation (engagement-down.svg, engagement-up.svg, engagement-warning.svg) were not found in the expected code location
All test scenarios cannot be completed due to the underlying module failure - this is a blocking bug in the Community Analytics extension
